free: #e Today, I am going to tell a story about our ancestors coming from Yi-lan.
#c 今天我要講一個故事, 是有關我們祖先起源於宜蘭的故事。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e Some time ago in Yi-lan there were many farms and lands of our ancestors’.
#c 從前在宜蘭有很多我們祖先的水田和土地。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)

meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e Then, Han people arrived there…went to Yi-lan.
#c 然後就有漢人到了宜蘭去。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e They were good at planning how to obtain our ancestors’ farms.
#c 他們很懂得計畫該如何才能得到祖先們的水田。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e Since Kavalan people have many superstitions, such as something about witches.
#c 由於噶瑪蘭人有很多的迷信, 比方說巫師之類的東西。

free: #e When there is something dirty (unclean) in a place, they will abandon that place.
#c 某個地方有髒東西的時候, 他們就會放棄那裡。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)

free: #e The Han people knew the customs of Kavalan, so they did so.
#c 漢人知道了噶瑪蘭的習俗, 所以他們就那樣。

free: #e They left dead dogs or chickens in the farm.
#c 他們把死狗或死雞丟到水田裡。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e Our ancestors saw them (dead dogs or chickens in the farm).
#c 我們的祖先們就看到了(田裡死去的狗或雞)。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)

meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e ‘How come there are such dead things.’ ‘That kind of things are bad,’ thought our ancestors.
#c 怎麼會有這樣的死掉的東西,那樣的東西不好,我們的祖先這樣想。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e (They) left them there and surrounded (that place). The land cannot be plowed, thought the elders.
#c 他們把地留在那裡不管,並且把它圍起來,這個田就不能耕作了,老人們這麼想。
#n baqian=ti  aizipna, old=PFV  3SG.NOM, 老=完成  3SG.主格, ‘He is old.’

meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e The land which had not been plowed for a long time was seen by the Hans.
#c 那個很久沒有人耕作的田被漢人看到了。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e (You) haven’t plowed this land for a long time.
#c 你們很久沒有耕作這塊田了。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e It’s my turn, thought the Hans, to occupy the farms of the (Kavalan) ancestors there.
#c “輪到我佔據(噶瑪蘭)祖先那邊的田地了”, 漢人這麼想。

free: #e The land was originally wide and large, but became smaller gradually.
#c 土地本來很寬大,但不知不覺地漸漸變小了。

free: #e It’s useless for us to stay here.
#c 我們在這邊也沒用, 幹嘛留在這裡呢。

free: #e They think they should leave (so) they left for the south.
#c 他們想說乾脆離開好了,(所以)他們就往南遷移。
#n pasa tiboR=pa=iku, toward	south=FUT=1SG.NOM, 往 南=未來=1SG.主格, ‘我要往南走’

free: #e (They) left for Hualien by raft, boat, or on foot.
#c (他們)搭竹筏,搭船,或走路遷移往花蓮。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 謝宗修, Buya, male, 1957-09-10

free: #e The place where they arrived first is Hualien.
#c 他們首先到達的地方是花蓮。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)

free: #c 有到那個茄禮村, 到達茄禮村。

free: #e ‘It is so wide here and is thus a good place for living,’ said they.
#c 他們說, ‘這裡很寬,是可以住的好地方。
#n qaizuwan-an-ku, live-NMZ-1SG.GEN, 住-名物化-1SG.屬格, ‘my place’

#c 過了很久,有日本人來管理這些人。
